comments.body:
Please manually include the `license_file`:

https://conda-forge.org/docs/meta.html#packaging-the-license-manually

and open an issue upstream about including it in the source distribution. If you could also put a copy of the issue url in the `meta.yaml` as a comment that would be great. This way there is a reminder to check on the status of the issue next time the feedstock is updated.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +31,35 @@  home: https://github.com/idank/bashlex
  license: GPL-3.0
  license_family: GPL
  # License file added manually so far:
  # https://github.com/idank/bashlex/issues/27
